name: Nomad Gunsmith
description: Nomad Gunsmiths fight while moving, adapting their Ostrumite weapons on the fly and turning terrain and momentum into weapons.

3.name: Mobile Calibration
3.description: Your speed increases, standing costs less movement, and opportunity attacks against you are made at disadvantage.

3.name: Trick Shot Protocol
3.description: When you hit with a firearm attack, you may spend a charge to apply a special trick shot effect.

7.name: Flow of the Dunes
7.description: Moving grants defensive bonuses, and you can disengage as a bonus action by spending a charge.

11.name: Adaptive Fire
11.description: At the start of your turn, choose a stance that alters speed, defense, or suppression.

15.name: Break Contact
15.description: When hit, you may spend a charge to reposition without provoking attacks, gaining advantage on your next shot.

18.name: Master of Motion
18.description: Movement no longer provokes opportunity attacks, and you can fire while moving.
